author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-IGM Financial says its total assets under management were $156.5 bln at Dec 31
text:
Jan 3 (Reuters) - Igm Financial Inc:
* IGM FINANCIAL ANNOUNCES DECEMBER 2017 INVESTMENT FUND SALES AND TOTAL ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT
* ‍TOTAL ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT WERE $156.5 BILLION AT DECEMBER 31, 2017, COMPARED WITH $156.9 BILLION AT NOVEMBER 30, 2017​
* ‍INVESTMENT FUND ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT WERE $149.3 BILLION AT DECEMBER 31, 2017, COMPARED WITH $149.7 BILLION AT NOVEMBER 30, 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
